objects.specification: A broad, low rectangular platform forming the base of the booth, featuring a subtly beveled edge and a smooth matte finish. The surface is uniformly neutral gray to provide a versatile backdrop that integrates seamlessly with other booth elements. It is constructed with durable material and precise right angles for a clean, professional appearance.

A tall vertical display wall rising above the other panels, designed as a seamless backdrop. It has a smooth flat surface and clean sharp corners, intended to showcase branding or graphics. The increased height emphasizes prominence and provides ample area for large-format visuals.

A standard-height vertical wall panel enclosing the front of the booth with precisely cut edges. It offers a consistent flat surface and a uniform neutral color for cohesion. This panel defines the booth boundary while maintaining open sightlines.

A vertical side wall with a slim profile, featuring a seamless surface and crisp corners. It frames the booth’s perimeter and supports structural integrity without visual distraction. The consistent neutral finish integrates with adjacent panels.

A matching vertical side wall mirroring the left panel, with a smooth finish and square edges. It completes the booth enclosure while maintaining an open entry and consistent visual style. The panel is robust and provides mounting opportunities.

A large engagement desk with a bold bright-red high-gloss finish, featuring smooth rounded corners and an ergonomic overhang for visitor interactions. The front face is uninterrupted to allow for branding or signage, while the surface is spacious enough for registration materials. It stands at a welcoming height and has sturdy concealed supports.

A tall, narrow display stand painted in vibrant cyan with a flat top platform for showcasing products. The stand features precise right angles, a thin profile, and a solid base plate for stability. Its glossy finish and bright color draw attention against the backdrop.
